tag_list: pueyrredon, latam, argentina, ecommerce, ebusiness, digital-economy, emarketing, software-as-a-service
overview:
Leading businessman industry of Information Technology and Communications TICs in Latin America. Holds studies of Business Administration with specializations in Marketing and TICs. He developed his career in multinational companies in the area Planning and marketing, taking their responsibilities within the implementation of E-business policies.

Now, in addition to his responsibilities at the private level, was a president of the Argentine Chamber of Electronic Commerce (CACE). Founder and director of the Center for Telework of the National Technological University UTN. Founder and President of the Latin American Institute of Electronic Commerce and university teaching in the subject in different Graduate Master and at the national and international levels.

Member of the Board of Young American Business Trust (YBAT)

He is the founder and CEO of ConsultaLine - The first Platform for Telework in Latin America with more than 45 platforms implemented and 1400 teleworkers.

Timely Advice to companies, associations and institutions in Argentina, Paraguay, Uruguay, Ecuador, Chile, Peru and Bolivia on subjects related Telework, New Technologies and Applied Electronics Business; for a better functional performance and professional.

It has rendered more than 350 Seminars, Workshops and courses Telework, Business and Electronic Commerce in Argentina, Paraguay, Uruguay, Brazil, Chile and Bolivia.

He is the author of numerous papers and articles in specialized media on the subject. It is active in projects and programs related TIC’sy the Electronic Business in Latin America.
